Articles.Content:
I liked the USI airbags mod, but it doesn't seem to work with KSP .90.

I forked the code, how does one update a mod to be compatible with a new version of KSP.

I liked the USI airbags mod, but it doesn't seem to work with KSP .90.

I forked the code, how does one update a mod to be compatible with a new version of KSP.

The airbags are part of the USI Survibablity pack. Found here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84359-0-25-USI-Survivability-Pack-%28Formerly-DERP%29-v0-1-3-2014-11-01

The Title of the thread wasnt changed yet, but the mod has been updated for .90 and works just fine.
oh. cool. didn't realize that. welp. no need to play around with it. Maybe i'll think of something sweet to add to KSP.
